meaningMnemonic: Destroy a <radical>lantern</radical> with your <radical>knife</radical> and you'll be <kanji>punish</kanji>ed.
readingMnemonic: I will <kanji>punish</kanji> you by taking away your <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい)! You'll never eat cake again. Not for birthdays, not for holidays. This is your punishment.
